com.github.erchu.beancp

Interface DeclarativeMapSetup<S,D>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - mapping source
    D - mapping destination
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface DeclarativeMapSetup<S,D>
    Interface for lambda expression used to define DeclarativeMap. Example shows how to use this interface, to bind getX() to setA(): 
     
 (config, source, destination) -> config.bind(source::getX, destination::setA))
    See Also:
    MapperBuilder.addMap(java.lang.Class, java.lang.Class, com.github.erchu.beancp.DeclarativeMapSetup)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply(DeclarativeMap<S,D> config, S source, D destination)
      Defines new map configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        void apply(DeclarativeMap<S,D> config,
           S source,
           D destination)
        Defines new map configuration. Implementation must be thread safe and has no side effects other that binding definition. Method could be called more than once.
        Parameters:
        config - configuration
        source - source and destination object
        destination - destination and destination object
